string.name: name
string.value: Find the Crumpled Piece of Paper Again
You have lost the list of informants you retrieved from the hut in the swamp region. What to do...? Let's go see #bJM#k again.

JM scowls and clicks his tongue at you. He says he'll provide you with the list of informants again, but asks you to pay #ba fee of 2000 Mesos#k and instructs you to leave it inside the trash can. Let's head over to #b#m107000300##k.
You have taken the list of informants out and left 2000 Mesos inside the trash can.
흠... 다일에 관한 음모의 실마리는 찾은 건가? 뭐? 정보원 목록을 잃어버렸다고? 누군가 목록을 주워 보기라도 하면 어쩔 거야?! 정보원은 비밀이 생명이라는 것 몰라?!
휴우... 이번만은 넘어가 주도록 하지. 하지만 다음 번에는 용서 없을 테니, 주의하라고. 다시 한 번 위험한 크로코1로 가서 정보를 받도록 해. 물론 정해진 시간에만 정보를 얻을 수 있어.
실수에 대한 대가로 이번에는 정보료를 받겠어. 쓰레기통 안에 2000메소를 넣어 놓고 정보를 가져가도록 해.
뭐야? 다시 할 자신이 없다는 건가?

Hmm... Have you found any clues about #o6220000#? What? You've lost the list of informants? What if someone finds the list?! Don't you know that secrecy is the most important aspect of being an informant?!
Sigh... I'll have the informants look for the list. I'll let you off the hook this time, but you won't get another chance! Go to #b#m107000300##k for another list of informants.

Of course, you can only receive the list during certain hours. You haven't forgotten, have you? It's #bfrom 5 p.m. to 8 p.m.#k Oh, I'm going to have to charge you a fee for your mistake. Put #b2000 Mesos#k in the trash can before taking the list.
Give me an update after you gather all the information from the informants on the list. I'll let you know which ones are valid and which ones are not.
#b(You feel something rustling inside the dusty trash can. Would you like to take it out of the trash can?)#k
#b(You have taken out a crumpled piece of paper covered in cobwebs.)#k
I guess you haven't been to #m107000301# yet... It's the hut in #b#m107000300#. You can only find the information if you go #bfrom 5 p.m. to 8 p.m.#k.. And don't forget to take #b2000 Mesos#k too.
